name: GWK GLOBALWORK inc
description: Operator of a candidate verification platform designed to build reliable links between companies and candidates. The company's platform connects processes in real-time and administers candidates and also supports the selection process with different tests, enabling businesses and corporate clients to understand employees' strengths and potentials that can be exercised in the organization.
